text: “Kodi amene wakhazikitsa maziko a chomanga chake chifukwa choopa Allah ndi kufunafuna chiyanjo (Chake), sindiye wabwino, kapena Yemwe wakhazikitsa maziko a chomanga chake m’mphepete mwa dzenje (lakuya) lomwe dothi lake likugumukira (m’dzenjemo) ndipo nkugwa pamodzi naye m’moto wa Jahannam, (ameneyu ndiye wabwino)? Ndithudi, Allah saongolera anthu ochita zoipa
